text: The Supreme Director of Chile was the person in charge of Chile's government after its independence from Spain. Several juntas also ruled the country during this period. The title came before the President of Chile. ==Supreme Directors== Name Took office Left office Party Francisco de la Lastra de la Sotta 1814 1814 Military Bernardo O'Higgins Riquelme 1818 1823 Military Ram√≥n Freire Serrano 1823 1826 Lib. ==Related pages== *President of Chile Category:Government of Chile
title: Supreme Director of Chile
